Posts.Content: Dec 17, 2015 05:53PM jessica21122 wrote: I got good news today! My scan looked great. No new activity, actually no activity. The spots I had before are now lesions. My cancer count went down. Nothing is lit up and glowing! I'm so happy I'm speechless! Thank you for all your prayers and well wishes. I will keep fighting the good fight!!!
